marytts.signalproc.adaptation.codebook
Class WeightedCodebookSpeakerItem

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.adaptation.codebook.WeightedCodebookSpeakerItem

public class WeightedCodebookSpeakerItem
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of speaker specific acoustic features for a voice conversion unit, i.e. a speech frame or a phone, etc.

Author:
Oytun Türk
